data.caption: Updated Link To Recording Of Analysts/Institutional Investor Meet/Con. Call
data.news_body: Sir/ Madam, Ref: Our letter dated November 19, 2022 providing the link to the Audio recording of the Investors Call on the Financial Results for Q4FY22 Sub: Updated link This is further to our letter dated November 19, 2022. Please find the updated link below to the audio recording of the Investors' Conference Call on the financial results for Q4FY22, which is also available on the Company's website: https://www.ptcfinancial.com/cms/showpage/page/press-releases Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Intimation Under Regulation 30 And 46(2)(Oa) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 - Audio Recording Of The Investors' Conference Call On The Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body: With reference to our letter dated November 17, 2022, and pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46(2)(oa) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform you that the audio recording of the Investors' Conference Call on the financial results for the Fourth Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2022 is available on the Company's website at PTC+India+Financial+Services+Limited+-+Q4FY22+Earnings+Conference+Call (mp3cut.net).mp3. Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: With reference to our previous letter regarding Video Conference Call, scheduled for today at 4:30 PM, please find enclosed the Investor Presentation for PTC India Financial Services Limited with this regard. This is also being uploaded on the website of the Company at https://www.ptcfinancial.com. This is for your information and records.Yours faithfully,

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting And Submission Of Financial Results.
data.news_body: Outcome of the Board meeting and submission of Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: This is to inform you that in the meeting of Board of Directors of PTC India Financial Services Limited (PFS/ the Company) held on August 5th, 2022, the agenda item dealing with the approval of Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter/ year ended March 31, 2022 was deferred by the Board and consequently, in compliance with the provisions of Regulation 33 of SEBI Listing Regulations, 2015, the Un-audited Financial Statements of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 could also not be finalized. Any further information in this regard shall be submitted in due course. This is for your information and records

data.caption: Audio Recording Of Conference Call For Q3 FY 22 Results
data.news_body: Sir/ Madam,Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, the Audio recording of Conference call for Q3 FY 22 results held on 30th May, 2022 is available at :https://www.ptcfinancial.com/userfiles/PFS_Recording_Q3FY22.mp3This is for your information please.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Dear Sir,Sub: Investor Presentation cum clarification cum corrigendum - Information for Quarter & 9 months ended 31st December, 2021 under Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015Please find attached herewith our investor presentation for Quarter & 9 months ended 31st December, 2021.We further refer to our Press Release dated 28 May 2022 in which there is a typo error on Page no. 2 (Key Performance Variables). We request to read Sanctions as Rs. 1,419 crore for Q3FY2 (instead of Rs.1,719 crore). There is no other change in the Press Release. An investor presentation is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 26Th May, 2022
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of PTC India Financial Services Limited in its meeting held on 26th May, 2022 has approved the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021 alongwith the Independent Auditors Report.

It is further to be mentioned that the Company is submitting the results with the stock exchanges after the prescribed time-line, however, the Company is submitting the results immediately on receipt of the Independent Auditor's review Report on the Un-audited quarterly and year to date standalone financial results of the Company pursuant to the Regulation 33 and 52 of SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Sir/ Madam,


Please find enclosed the Investor Presentation for PTC India Financial Services Limited.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 09Th November, 2021
data.news_body:
Sir/ Madam,

Sub: Outcome of Board Meeting dated 09th November, 2021

This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of PTC India Financial Services Limited in its meeting held on today i.e. 09th November, 2021 has considered, approved and taken on record the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors for the Quarter and Half Year ended on 30th September, 2021. Copy of the same is enclosed.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body:
Clarification cum corrigendum - Information for quarterly result for period ended 30th June 2021 under Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations. 2015

Dear Sir / Madam,
We refer the interview of our management dated 6th August 2021 on leading business channel, CNBC TV18 whereas it was stated that there is increase in Gross NPA and Net NPA in value terms of our company which may create confusion among the investor community. In this regard we may like to clarify that our Gross NPA and Net NPA has been reduced in value terms as mentioned below:

We further refer our investment presentation dated 06 August, 2021 in which there is typo error on slide no. 23 and we request to read Tax Expense and PAT as Rs. 15.33 crore and Rs. 45.60 crore respectively for quarter ended 30th June 2021. There is no other change in the presentation. An updated Investor presentation is enclosed herewith.

data.news_body:
Sir/ Madam,

Sub: Outcome of Board Meeting dated 05th August, 2021

Ref : Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015

This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of PTC India Financial Services Limited in their meeting held on today i.e. 05th August, 2021 has considered, approved and taken on record the 'Un-audited Financial Results' along with the limited review report of the Statutory Auditor of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June, 2021 for FY 21-22. Copy of the same is enclosed herewith.

data.news_body:

Sir/ Madam,

Sub: Investor Presentation

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 09Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
Sir/ Madam,

Sub: Outcome of Board Meeting dated 09th June, 2021

Ref : Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015

This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of PTC India Financial Services Limited in its meeting held on today i.e. 09th June, 2021 has considered, approved and taken on record the followings:-

1. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the Statutory Auditor Report for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2021. Copy of Audited Financial Results along with Audit Report is enclosed.

2. Further, we do hereby declare and confirm that the Audit Report issued by M/s. MSKA & Associates, Statutory Auditors of the Company on Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and Financial year ended 31st March, 2021 are with unmodified opinion.

3. The Board has not recommended any dividend for FY 20-21.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 09Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
Sir/ Madam,

Sub: Outcome of Board Meeting dated 09th June, 2021

Ref : Regulation 33 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015

This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of PTC India Financial Services Limited in its meeting held on today i.e. 09th June, 2021 has considered, approved and taken on record the followings:-

1. Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the Statutory Auditor Report for the Quarter and Financial Year ended on 31st March, 2021. Copy of Audited Financial Results along with Audit Report is enclosed.

2. Further, we do hereby declare and confirm that the Audit Report issued by M/s. MSKA & Associates, Statutory Auditors of the Company on Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Quarter and Financial year ended 31st March, 2021 are with unmodified opinion.

3. The Board has not recommended any dividend for FY 20-21.

This is for your information and record please.
